content.text1: provides a decentralized storage network of Web3 ecosystem. It supports multiple storage layer protocols such as IPFS, and exposes storage interfaces to application layer. Crust's technical stack is also capable of supporting a decentralized computing layer. It is designed to build a decentralized cloud ecosystem that values data privacy and ownership.

TEE.title: Meaningful Proof of Work
TEE.desc: Based on the TEE (Trusted Execution Environment) technology, Crust implements MPoW (Meaningful Proof of Work) mechanism to quantify meaningful storage resource usage and generate corresponding work report in a reliable way.

MPoW.title: Guaranteed by Storage Resources
MPoW.desc: Crust's GPoS (Guaranteed Proof of Stake) consensus uses storage resources as a guarantee. It encourages nodes to provide more storage resources, and improves the security and robustness of the network.

GPoS.title: Decentralized Cloud Storage and Computing
GPoS.desc: With GPoS consensus and MPoW mechanism, Crust is able to support the quantification and consensus of both storage and computing resource usage, and builds ubiquitous decentralized cloud storage and computing capabilities.

indexproduct.title: Crust
indexproduct.content: Crust implements the incentive layer protocol for decentralized storage. It is adaptable to multiple storage layer protocols such as IPFS, and provides support for the application layer. Crust's architecture also has the capability of supporting a decentralized computing layer and building a decentralized cloud ecosystem.
indexproduct.onecontent: Based on the TEE (Trusted Execution Environment) technology, Crust implements MPoW (Meaningful Proof of Work) mechanism to quantify meaningful storage resource usage and generate corresponding work report in a reliable way.
indexproduct.twocontent: Crust's GPoS (Guaranteed Proof of Stake) consensus uses storage resources as a guarantee. It encourages nodes to provide more storage resources, and improves the security and robustness of the network.
indexproduct.threecontent: With GPoS consensus and MPoW mechanism, Crust is able to support the quantification and consensus of both storage and computing resource usage, and builds ubiquitous decentralized cloud storage and computing capabilities.

members.name: Bova Chen
members.title: Co-Founder
members.desc: He has 15+ yrs experience of financial investment. He started as TMT researcher and then managed several funds as investment director. He founded Winsun Capital and did successful investments in crypto industry.

members.name: Leo Wang
members.title: Co-Founder
members.desc: He has 15+ yrs experience in IT industry. Leo worked in Microsoft and Cisco as senior development lead. He got rich experience in distributed storage, cloud computing and blockchain, and led a blockchain-based project to store and exchange manufacturing data in different geo-locations.

members.name: Zikun Fan
members.title: Technical Lead
members.desc: He got his master degree in Computer Science from ZheJiang University and received the PhD offer from CERCS Lab of Georgia Tech. Zikun worked in Microsoft on Azure Kubernetes and blockchain based projects.

members.name: Steve Shi
members.title: Market Lead
members.desc: He got 10+ yrs experience of marketing, program operation and new product management in IT Industry. Steve got both his master degree and MBA from Shanghai Jiaotong University. He worked in Cisco to support new product global launch business.

members.name: Dean Yan
members.title: Product Lead
members.desc: Dean is experienced in information security and blockchain technologies. He has been working in Cisco on supply chain blockchain based projects, one of his innovation projects was announced in global Development@Cisco conference.

members.name: Yang Zhao
members.title: Core Developer
members.desc: Yang got his master's degree from Tsinghua University. He has participated in open source projects and made significant contributions. Yang worked in Microsoft on cyber security, distributed storage and big data projects.

members.name: Yao Zhao
members.title: Core Developer
members.desc: Yao got his master’s degree from Shanghai Jiaotong University. He is experienced in Data security and Linux kernel technologies. Yao worked inCisco IT security department and participated several blockchain projects.
